column5: My ankle is starting to feel better so I took my 6 year old son walking on the nith in some new areas.We both had a lot of hits and I managed a couple of small bass. My son lost a bass right in front of him and managed to land this guy.He refuses to hold them.The conservation web site says the nith gets runs of trout in the fall and can see why.There was some really nice waters in this new section we tried.Here are a few scenery shots.Never realized how great it is around here until starting to fish again.All these pictures were within a 10 minute walk of my house.Hope you enjoy

Where abouts on the Nith were you? Im far away, but I use to fish in in my teenie bopper years when I was living in New Hamburg. Use to fish carp,YES carp. The dam held some real nice smallies and rockies. Man did you bring back some memories with this post.  Nice doooo on the young lad.My youngests,22,still has one.LOL

hey Misfish, this is the Nith in Paris right before it enters into the Grand.It is funny you mentioned New Hamburg as I just moved to Paris from there a couple years ago.The dam there is where I slowly started taking these guys fishing
rock bass always put up a good fight  looks like a real nice spot there
Man is there a chance we might know each other ?.LOL Maybe yer a son of someone I know.LOL I played hockey there in the late 70.s,the old barn. Have a couple of good friends from Baden. PMing ya.
NICE LOOKIN RIVER!!! GLAD TO SEE MORE PEOPLE GETTIN THE KIDS OUT!!! NICE JOB BRO

Paris,the home of the great wool and yarn place. The wife and her late aunt use to go there to get thier supplies. Still have the sweater coat her aunt made for me.  I am verplunketed at this thread. Did I spell verplunketed right Roy,douG ???????????
lol,you thinking of Mary Maxim by any chance Misfish?And thanks,CC.Try to get the kids out every day
Yep thats the place.Just asked.LOL  Small world aint it.
Woo... nice hair cut for the kid
The Nith is a beauty. My Dad took me for my first canoe adventure up near Ayr when I was 12. Great pics & report.
